title: Tiny Laser Watch Face
summary: Tiny Laser is a futuristic animated Watch Face for your Android Wear smartwatch.
description: A Tiny Laser show each time you read your Android Wear smart watch.Features:* Futuristic, ever changing Watch Face animation* Amazing Rainbow effect every 15 minutes* Six different colors for the Laser beams* Movement pattern changes frequently* Or pick one of five Background Colors* Settings: Date, Battery Level, 12-hour mode * Optimized for minimal battery usage* Ambient screen with burn-in protection for OLED* Works on round and square watchesNote:Please make sure your watch runs Android Wear 5.0 or newer.Made for Moto 360.
descriptionHTML:
A Tiny Laser show each time you read your Android Wear smart watch.

Features:
* Futuristic, ever changing Watch Face animation
* Amazing Rainbow effect every 15 minutes
* Six different colors for the Laser beams
* Movement pattern changes frequently
* Or pick one of five Background Colors
* Settings: Date, Battery Level, 12-hour mode
* Optimized for minimal battery usage
* Ambient screen with burn-in protection for OLED
* Works on round and square watches

Note:
Please make sure your watch runs Android Wear 5.0 or newer.

Made for Moto 360.
comments: I really like it.  A simple and cool flashy watchface.   It works well on my Moto 360 Sport.
Oct2 2016 ambient mode is bright large digital clock..  not sure how oled protection
Very nice. Really appreciate the battery percentage feature.
recentChanges: improved burn-in protection for OLED screens.
